exists = joystick_exists(1)// Returns whether joystick id (1 or 2) exists. name = joystick_name(1)// Returns the name of the joystick axes = joystick_axes(1)// Returns the number of axes of the joystick. buttons = joystick_buttons(1)// Returns the number of buttons of the joystick. havePOV = joystick_has_pov(1)// Returns whether the joystick has point-of-view capabilities. joyDirection = joystick_direction(1)// Returns the keycode (vk_numpad1 to vk_numpad9) corresponding to the direction of joystick id (1 or 2).
